data.text: @DrDinD We understand your disappointment. Florence is heavily congested, and the lack of staff severely slows down even the most normal processes such as baggage delivery. We are sorry for what happened.

@DrDinD Dear Daniel, as mentioned, this critical situation is affecting big european airports, and also airports overseas. We are sorry for the incovenience suffered and we are doing our best to assist our passengers, as well as all other airlines are doing. Thank you.
@silvie_ita Dear Silvia, cabin bag are always allowed within the fare you've booked (1pc of 8kg in Economy and 2pcs of 8kg each in Business). Thank you.
@pieterratering Dear Pieter, we have sent you a reply to your DM. Thank you.
@handmadebyeliz Dear Eliz, we are deeply sorry. As mentioned in DM, we have sent a reminder to our Baggage Center and our colleagues will try to get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you.
@Cheechfarmer Dear Jane, please DM us with his file reference number and we'll do our best to assist you. Thank you.
@Milla_Camargo Dear Milla, deeply sorry to hear about this. Please DM us your file reference number. Thank you.
@ornifelizia Dear Lolita, we are already in contact in DM and we are assisting other passengers too. Thank you for your patience.

urls.title: LEONARDO DA VINCI AND THE FLYING MACHINES | Air Dolomiti Blog
urls.description: It’s hard to describe who Leonardo Da Vinci was using mere words.The greatness of the Florentine painter, sculptor, illustrator...

data.text: ✈️ #AirDolomitiBlog Before airplanes, helicopters, airships, hot-air balloons and hang-gliders, human flight was nothing but a pipe dream. But not for Leonardo Da Vinci, the genius who made everything possible 👉 https://t.co/M1vg11S2EO https://t.co/2IoghF2awU
@ornifelizia Hello, we have just replied to your request in DM 😇 thank you!

@gabbettville Dear Crista,
your file is under BA control, please get in touch with them for appropriate assistance. Thank you.

data.text:
@gabbettville Dear Crist,
please check our reply in the other Tweet. Thank you.

@gabbettville Dear Crista,
we are sorry to hear about your delayed bag. Please DM us with your file reference number, and we'll do our best to assist you. Thank you.
@nisargafalling Sorry to hear about your delayed bag, please DM us your file reference number. We'll do our best to assist you. Thank you.

@Rat35385844 We are sorry for the situation. Yesterday we gave you feedback asking you to send us in DM, to protect your privacy, the number of your file but we have not received anything yet. We await for your message, thank you.
@mmpeck Dear Michele, we are sorry for the situation. We have replied to your conversation in DM. Thank you.
@kelseyVlinn Hello, sorry to hear about this. Please DM us with your file reference number, we'll do our best to assist you. Thank you.

data.text: @DrDinD @denisevasi @anthonymandler @lufthansa Hi Daniel, we are sorry to hear about this situation. We have asked our Baggage Center to give you a feedback asap. Thank you.

@DrDinD Dear Daniel, the situation at most airports, and not just European ones, is unprecedented. The lack of staff is causing several inconveniences to our passengers, and we are doing all we can to provide assistance. We have asked our Baggage Center to give you a feedback. Thank you.
@handmadebyeliz Hi Eliz, we have acknowledged your request in DM. Thank you
@mmpeck Hi Michele, please send us a DM with your file reference number and we'll do our best to assist you. Thank you.

data.text: @josephtodd @united @lufthansa @toscanaeroporti Hi Joseph, sorry to hear that. Could you please send us a DM with your file reference number? We can check together if it's under our competence, and assist you eventually. Thank you.
@julie_hainje We are sorry about the situation, but please try to contact them again. Thank you for your patience.

@julie_hainje Hi Julie, we are sorry to hear that. During the first 5 days after filing, the record is managed by Lost&Found. We advise you to get in touch with them directly. We apologise again for the inconvenience.
@Rat35385844 If you have a report with us, please DM us the file number. Sorry for the incovenience.
@DrDinD We are deeply sorry to hear this. We have asked our Baggage Center to get back to you as soon as possible. Thank you.
@sabilovestweet Innsbruck 😍 what wonderful colours, thank you for sharing this pic with us!
@Rat35385844 Most of the luggage currently at L&F in Florence are bags that have been sent from other airports to be returned to passengers. Have a nice day.

@psaviousa We are sorry that our on-board service was not satisfying (even for Ermete). If you have any complaints, please write to us in DM with the details and we will forward them to the appropriate department. Thank you!

@psaviousa Wow, what a view! 😍
Always happy to have you on board ✈️
@psaviousa The early bird gets the worm 😉☀️
@psaviousa Welcome back to beautiful Turin!

@Rat35385844 We always load luggage on our flights.
Florence airport is an exception in some cases due to its geographical location where even 1 knot of wind can make a difference to safety procedures during take-off/landing.

@arcillahumeda @DrDinD Hello, we always pay attention to every passenger request. As a company account, our settings have automatic follow so that we have immediate possibilities in responding to users. Thank you

@DrDinD Unfortunately this is an exceptional period where unexpected disruptions occurred all across European airports, but we will all keep on working and handling all the requests as soon as possible as we have always done in the past, thank you once again for your comprehensio
@Texas917 Hi Texas917, we are really sorry for the situation. In this case, you can directly write to our Baggage Center at baggage@airdolomiti.it and the colleagues will help you as soon as possible

@ManFjr Hi fjroman, we just answered to your private message. 
Thank you

@DrDinD Could you please send us the file reference via private message? 
Thank you

@DrDinD Hi, we are really sorry for the situation. In this case, you can find the procedure here https://t.co/vMvT6IRfdH or you can directly write to baggage@airdolomiti.it and the colleagues will help you as soon as possible

@pg21707 Hi Philip, we are really sorry for the current situation and for the inconveniences.
If you need assistance and bought an Air Dolomiti ticket please send us your booking code or ticket number via private message
@new_old_dream Hi Dicky, we are sorry to hear about this delay. Should we help you further, please DM us. Thank you.

data.text: @TQCreated1971 @lufthansa Dear Tony, we have replied to your DM on FB. Thank you.

@GoffiAlberto We are sorry to hear that your bag has not yet been filed. Having written to our Baggage Center, you should have received your case number. Please send an integration with the list of contents to the following form, thank you: https://t.co/0N3iR752xW
@abkorabelnikov Thanks
@fs_fra Although we are sorry for what happened, we are glad that thanks to our assistance your cases have been resolved. Thank you for your encouraging words in these difficult times!

@fs_fra We treat every passenger with care, whatever the request. We have been doing this for 30 years and will continue to do so, because assisting a passenger (without the use of a bot), is still central.
@handmadebyeliz Dear Eliz, please DM us with your file reference number. We will check together which airline is handling your file. Thank you.

data.text: @abkorabelnikov Dear Alla, we answered you in the other tweet. Thank you.
@abkorabelnikov Dear Alla, we are sorry to hear about this situation. Please DM us your file reference. Thank you for your cooperation.

@imwritingwrongs We regret the negative perception regarding our customer service. We assure you that we are taking care of every lost luggage file, but that the current situation at airports (lack of staff) does not provide for a quick resolution as per our standards.

@denisevasi Dear Denise, based on the tracking, your 8 bags were left at LAX. They have been restarted on FLR these days. You will be contacted shortly by email from the relevant department. Thank you.

urls.title: Issuu
urls.description: The Italian airline of Lufthansa Group, based in

data.text:
The Verona Arena is a unique and prestigious venue.
Have you ever wondered how much work goes into staging each show? In this issue of #SpazioItaliaMagazine we reveal what it takes to produce the perfect performance and create a truly magical atmosphere 👉https://t.co/v5zD9dfSpN https://t.co/gqDaos6NEF

@Rat35385844 Due to the high amount of requests the waiting times are longer than usual.
We are doing our best to give feedback as soon as possible. Thank you for you patience

@denisevasi Hi Denise, we are really sorry for the situation. As anticipated on our other channels, Our colleagues at the Baggage Competence Center will be back to you as soon as possible via email. Thank you for your comprehension
Dear @denisevasi , we are sorry for the inconvenience. As per the conversation on Instagram we are already managing your file through our competent office. Thanks for understanding
@Rat35385844 Hi @πRat! We are very sorry for the situation. You can contact our baggage competence center directly at the following email address: BAGGAGE@AIRDOLOMITI.IT . Thank you for your patience

@Rat35385844 Hi @πRat , we apologize for the inconvenience. For more information, you can contact our baggage competence center directly at the following email address: BAGGAGE@AIRDOLOMITI.IT . Thank you
Hi @imwritingwrongs ! Please note that in these cases we always assist all of our passengers via private messages due to privacy reasons. Thank you

urls.title: Inflight service Settimocielo| Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Check out the on-board service offered on Air Dolomiti flights according to the fare you have purchased.

data.text: @SkyLaGatta Hi! You can discover our Menu here: https://t.co/x4P5sISl4J

@HowardPamhoward We fully understand and are deeply sorry. The volume of requests does not allow us to give feedback as per our standards, but we work hard to follow up each file thoroughly and give appropriate response. We are sure you will receive feedback, and we thank you for

@_valentinalolli Gentile Valentina, ci scusiamo per il disagio. Al fine di tutelare la sua privacy, le chiediamo di scriverci in privato i seguenti dettagli: numero pratica, email e contatto telefonico. Grazie per la preziosa collaborazione.

@HowardPamhoward Dear Pam, we are very sorry for the inconvenience caused. If you have not already done so, please send an email to our department in charge stating the details of your case, you will receive appropriate assistance: baggage@airdolomiti.itThank you.

@bsalling72 Dear Brandon, flight EN8203/30JUN VCEMUC currently has an estimated delay of about 1h, due to the aircraft being late from the previous flight. We apologise in advance for any inconvenience caused.
@marky_shmed We are sorry to hear about your missing bag. Please DM us with the number of your file reference to receive assistance. Thank you for your cooperation.

data.text:
Today is World Social Media Day! 😛
Firstly, a very warm thank you to all followers who engage with all our Lufthansa Group channels. But also a thank you to all our social media units 💙 who provide daily updates, information and insights into our company with great dedication. https://t.co/iLEWrkdBFZ
@AliceTench Dear Alice, we are glad that your luggage has been found. We apologise again for the inconvenience suffered, and send our best regards.
@AliceTench Dear Alice, we are glad that your luggage has been found. We apologise again for the inconvenience suffered, and send our best regards.
@GoffiAlberto Dear Alberto, we are sorry to hear about your bag. Please DM us with your file reference number, thank you for your cooperation.

@CallieAeline @FlyingBrussels Dear Callie, we are really sorry to hear about your missing bag. We thank you for your DM, please follow the guidelines provided via private message. Thank you very much.

@Antof9 Dear Margaret, we are sorry to hear about your missing bag.
Please DM us with the number of your file reference. Thank you for your cooperation.

On special occasions, we like to give our customers an extra treat 🍬
Which colour would you choose? 
Green, red, yellow or turquoise (our favourite colour!)? 💙

#WeAreAirDolomiti https://t.co/TEedIJH7tV
@CrimsonFields18 Thanks to you, we look forward to welcoming you on board again next time! 😊

domain.description: Cities around the world

data.text: @larissayrainey Hi Larissa, we are sorry for the situation, please note that we don't have any Air Dolomiti office in Frankfurt. In your case please only refer to the airline with which you opened your file, thank you for your comprehension
@larissayrainey Hi Larissa, we are sorry for the situation, please note that we don't have any office in SFO. In your case please only make reference to the airline with which you opened the file

@HewittJSB Hi Angela, we are really sorry for the situation. Due to the high amount of requests received unfortunately there could be some delays, but the colleagues will help you as soon as possible. Thank you for your understanding
@DirtyFangz Hi, we are really sorry, could you please send us your booking reference via private message, so that we can check your case? Thank you
@rainey_larissa Dear Larissa, we are deeply sorry for the inconvenience caused. May we ask you to write the code of your baggage file in DM? Thank you for your cooperation.

@ltownsend Thanks for your kind reply. By clicking on the link provided, you will find details of the dedicated email address to which you can write in case your bag has been missing for at least 5 days. Our colleagues are working non-stop to respond to all requests as soon as po

urls.title: Travel insurance policy | Air Dolomiti
urls.description: Select the travel insurance policy that suits your needs from the options provided by Air Dolomiti and activate extra coverage

data.text:
Taking care of your family is always important - and holidays are no exception.
Choose the @EA_Italia a cover that's best for you and enjoy peace of mind when travelling! 😇👉 https://t.co/d9fBLfXFMa https://t.co/2J9eYjL7Ko

@fs_fra One of our goals has always been the punctuality of our flights, but we fully understand that in this period various causes (also external) do not always allow us to meet this priority. We deeply apologise for the inconvenience caused and work daily to improve our operati

@ltownsend We are sorry to hear about your lost baggage. We kindly invite you to follow the procedure indicated by clicking on "baggage irregularity" at this link: https://t.co/54prB2goa1
Thank you very much.
@nisargafalling Hi Nisarga, we confirm you that all the procedures follow the international regulations

urls.title: AIRPORTS DESIGNED BY ARCHISTARS | Air Dolomiti Blog
urls.description: Airports designed by archistars are the gateways and flagships of fast-paced, vibrant and high-tech cities.

data.text:
They are the monuments of our time, the new #gateways to cities, countries and cultures. Let’s celebrate our #airports ✈️
Introducing 5 iconic airports 👉 https://t.co/qYIixGabiI https://t.co/6fc75daBUN
@nisargafalling Hi Nisarga, please note that, if you opened your file with another airline, you received a different reference number and you should direcly refer to this last arline

@AnthroposO Hi Traveler, we are really sorry for the inconvenience, if you wish you can directly contact our E-Mail address baggage@airdolomiti.it . Please note that if the last leg of your journey was operated by another airline, you should only refer to this airline
@HewittJSB Hi Angela, you can find the procedure here https://t.co/54prB2goa1 , you can also directly contact the Lost&Found office of the airport for more information

@JeremyRussell12 Hi Jeremy, as anticipated, the Lost&Found is an office of the airport and not an Air Dolomiti office. Please follow the indications in the E-Mail as we do not have access to your file in this case, thank you for your understanding

data.text: @Antof9 @JeremyRussell12 @NSD_Russell @lufthansa Hi Margaret, we are really sorry, the Lost&Found is an office of the airport and not an Air Dolomiti office, the colleagues are working tirelessly to send the baggage as soon as possible
@sxz5046 Hi Suzanne, we are really sorry for the inconvenience. In this case, you can check the Baggage irregularity procedure here https://t.co/54prB2goa1

@RRustogi Hi Rohini, if you are just landed and need assistance with your baggage you can directly check with the Lost&Found at the airport, the colleagues at the airport will help you with the further steps

@nisargafalling Hi Nisarga, you can find the contacts for the Lost&Found on the official website of the airport. Our colleagues will also provide you a feedback as soon as possible from baggage@airdolomiti.it

@luvkav_design Dear Kavana, we apologize for this and we totally understand your disappointment. To receive updates on this, we suggest you write to the email address baggage@airdolomiti.it. Our colleagues of the Customer Relations will get back to you as soon as possible.
@luvkav_design We remain at your complete disposal for any further need. Jessie

@HewittJSB @bachlive @bachleipzig Hello Angela, we are very sorry for what has happened and we apologize for any inconvenience you may have experienced. We suggest you send the details of your request to the email address baggage@airdolomiti.it.

@HewittJSB @bachlive @bachleipzig Our colleagues of the Customer Relations Office will take care of your request in a very short time. We remain at your disposal for any further assistance renewing our apologies

@nisargafalling @331miles If you wish to get some updates about your issue we kindly suggest you to contact the Lost and Found office over the phone or to write an email to baggage@airdolomiti.it
We remain at your disposal for any further information. Steph

@nisargafalling @331miles Dear Nisarga,
we apologize for the inconvenience and we ensure you that the colleagues at the airport together with our department in charge always try to locate the bags and inform all the passengers as soon as possible.

@fs_fra We apologize once again for the incovenience and we kindly inform you that, if you wish to submit a compensation request due to the delays of your flights, you can do it through the following form: https://t.co/qBrPMQ84O6
